Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "RPossess (remotely possess) is used to possess character bodies or woenames \\"from a distance,\\" (i.e. from outside of their environment).\\r\\n\\r\\nAfter possessing an object, simply type +rpossess again without arguments to un-possess."

"+rpossess \\"[NPC:misc:scroll]#19336\\"\\r\\n Possess the woe object \<[NPC:misc:scroll]#19336\>\\r\\n\\r\\n+rpossess geli\\r\\n Possess the character Geli\\r\\n\\r\\n+rpossess\\r\\n Unpossess the currently remote-possessed object"
